question: [Brief] Italiano: Comunica which category has the highest bar dal grafico a barre.

qas.question: [Brief] Italiano: Comunica which category has the highest bar dal grafico a barre.
[Practice] English: Tell which category has the lowest bar from the bar chart.
[Study] Norsk: Oppgi what is the difference between the tallest and shortest bars fra stolpediagrammet.
